name: RentWise Assistant
description: An AI‑driven rental‑management agent that automatically pulls lease agreements, maintenance tickets, and payment histories to send rent reminders, schedule repairs, and generate financial reports for property managers.

tools.name: fetch_lease_agreement
tools.description: Retrieves the lease agreement document for a given property and optional tenant. Returns the lease text or a link to the stored PDF.

property_id.description: Unique identifier of the rental property.

tenant_id.description: Optional unique identifier of the tenant.

tools.name: fetch_maintenance_tickets
tools.description: Returns a list of open or filtered maintenance tickets for a specific property, including ticket IDs, descriptions, statuses, and priority.

property_id.description: Unique identifier of the rental property.

status.description: Optional filter for ticket status (e.g., open, in_progress, closed).

tools.name: fetch_payment_history
tools.description: Retrieves payment records for a property (or a specific tenant) covering amounts, due dates, and payment status.

property_id.description: Unique identifier of the rental property.

tenant_id.description: Optional unique identifier of the tenant.

tools.name: send_rent_reminder
tools.description: Sends an email reminder to a tenant about an outstanding rent amount and due date. Returns a confirmation string.

amount_due.description: Outstanding rent amount in the local currency.

due_date.description: ISO‑8601 formatted date when the rent was due.

tools.name: schedule_repair
tools.description: Schedules a repair appointment for a maintenance ticket with a specified date and optional contractor. Returns a scheduling confirmation.

ticket_id.description: Identifier of the maintenance ticket to be repaired.

scheduled_date.description: ISO‑8601 date (and optional time) for the repair.

contractor_id.description: Optional identifier of the contractor who will perform the repair.

tools.name: update_payment_status
tools.description: Updates the status of a specific payment record (e.g., marked as paid, partially paid, or disputed). Returns a status update message.

payment_id.description: Unique identifier of the payment transaction.

status.description: New status value (e.g., paid, pending, disputed).

tools.name: generate_financial_report
tools.description: Creates a PDF/Markdown financial summary for selected properties over a date range, including revenue, expenses, and outstanding balances.

start_date.description: ISO‑8601 start date for the report period.

end_date.description: ISO‑8601 end date for the report period.

property_ids.description: Optional list of property identifiers to include. If omitted, all properties are used.

examples.description: User asks the assistant to send rent reminders to all tenants with overdue payments for property PROP123.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI that helps property managers automate rent reminders, repairs, and reporting by calling appropriate tools.
Please send rent reminders to any tenants who are late on their rent for property PROP123.
Fetching the latest payment history for property PROP123 to identify overdue balances.
I found one overdue tenant (Alice). Sending a reminder now.
Reminder email queued for alice@example.com (Amount: 1250.00, Due: 2025-11-01).
✅ Rent reminder sent to alice@example.com. No other tenants are overdue at the moment.

examples.description: User reports a burst pipe in unit 4B of property PROP789 and asks the assistant to schedule a repair for tomorrow.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, helping property managers handle maintenance tickets and repair scheduling.
A pipe burst in unit 4B of property PROP789. Please schedule a repair for tomorrow morning.
Creating a maintenance ticket for the burst pipe in unit 4B of PROP789.
Scheduling the repair for ticket MT-2025-001 on 2025-12-08 (tomorrow) with our preferred contractor.
Repair for ticket MT-2025-001 scheduled on 2025-12-08 at 09:00 with contractor CONTRACTOR_42.
✅ The repair has been scheduled for tomorrow at 9 AM. The contractor will confirm shortly.
